What is the name of BuzzFeed News' health advice column?
What is the purpose of Asking for a Friend column?
To get answers from medical experts about weird questions related to one's body
What percentage chance is there that others have the same weird health experiences as you?
What should you do if something serious is going on with your health?
Are there any silly questions in Asking for a Friend?
How can you submit a question to be answered in the column?
Can you return to the form to submit more questions?
What are some examples of questions that might be asked to the column?
Weird discharge, bumps on skin, peeing after sex, hands swelling during hiking, nausea from smoking weed
Is the column a safe space for asking questions?
Will all submitted questions be answered in the column?
No, only some may be answered in upcoming columns
